item.title: Version 5.7.0
item.description:
Focusmo 5.7.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Projects : Introducing Projects(earlier Workspaces), a new way to categorise tasks. See how much time you spend on coding, or writing or any project as you work.
    • Set apps and websites blocking rules for each project.
    • Open apps for your project in a single click
  • Growth Stats : View your growth in realtime. See exactly how much you grew from last day or week or month in a single glance.
  • Edit Sessions in Timeline: Easily assign projects to any session
  • More Metrics to Track: Since there are more metrics, you can pin any metric on top. Just hover and click pin icon.
